Recommendations: if possible additional laboratory technician should be hire to take charge of the repair and maintenance of equipment likewise a laboratory do may be assign to monitor and properly maintain the laboratory
operation manual for faculty should be provide in each laboratory
document to show regular replenishment of laboratory supply and proof of implementation of the rule and regulation for every laboratory room should be make evident
it is recommend that additional simulation room be provide for skill base subject to expose student to the practical aspect of theoretical learn
furniture and equipment in the laboratory room should be properly arrange to allow free flow of movement and enable student to work comfortably
all laboratory equipment should be properly clean and checked regularly to as certain their good work condition
photocopy of document and picture should be make clear
document should be update properly file and document likewise only relevant necessary and pertinent document should be include
